field.label: Enable
field.help: Enable the usage of DNS blocklists.

field.label: Force SafeSearch
field.help: Force the usage of SafeSearch on Google, DuckDuckGo, Bing, Qwant, PixaBay and YouTube

field.label: Type of DNSBL
field.help: Select which kind of DNSBL you want to use.

field.label: URLs of Blocklists
field.help: List of domains from where blocklist will be downloaded.

field.label: Whitelist Domains
field.help: List of domains to whitelist. You can use regular expressions.

field.label: Blocklist Domains
field.help: List of domains to blocklist. Only exact matches are supported.

field.label: Wildcard Domains
field.help: List of wildcard domains to blocklist. All subdomains of the given domain will be blocked. Blocking first-level domains is not supported.

field.label: Return Response Code
field.help: Use the DNS response code for entries in the blocklist.

field.label: Destination Address
field.help: Destination ip address for entries in the blocklist (leave empty to use default: 0.0.0.0). Only used when "Return Response Code" is "A".
